scripts.clean: pkill -9 -f 'next dev' 2>/dev/null; pkill -9 -f 'next-server' 2>/dev/null; rm -rf .next .next-web .next-backoffice 2>/dev/null; lsof -ti:3000,3001 2>/dev/null | xargs -r kill -9 2>/dev/null; echo '✅ Limpieza completada'
scripts.clean:web: lsof -ti:3001 2>/dev/null | xargs -r kill -9 2>/dev/null; rm -rf .next-web 2>/dev/null; echo '✅ Puerto 3001 limpiado'
scripts.clean:backoffice: lsof -ti:3000 2>/dev/null | xargs -r kill -9 2>/dev/null; rm -rf .next-backoffice 2>/dev/null; echo '✅ Puerto 3000 limpiado'
scripts.dev:web: npm run clean:web && sleep 1 && NEXT_DIST_DIR=.next-web NEXT_PUBLIC_APP_MODE=web next dev -p 3001
scripts.dev:backoffice: npm run clean:backoffice && sleep 1 && NEXT_DIST_DIR=.next-backoffice NEXT_PUBLIC_APP_MODE=backoffice next dev -p 3000
